comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: The top photo appears to be edited ... the troops marching do not match the perspective of the buildings in the background or the civilians in the square.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From The Day (from New London, CT) on 8/28/1814 news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1915&dat=19140828&... indicates that the British Marines landed in Ostend on August 27, 1914 From www.1914-1918.net/hli.htm The Highland Light Infantry, 2nd Battalion, landed in Boulogne on August 14, 1914
